eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.construction

类 RecipeMapBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.construction.RecipeMapBuilder

  • public class RecipeMapBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for RecipeMap creation.

    Used for MultiblockBuilder.withRecipeMap(RecipeMap).

    ZenClass:
    mods.gregtech.recipe.FactoryRecipeMap

      • startBuilder

        public static gregtech.api.recipes.crafttweaker.CTRecipeBuilder startBuilder(CustomRecipeProperty... recipeProperties)
        Create a new, blank CTRecipeBuilder that will be the base recipe for any new ones.
        返回:
        A blank CTRecipeBuilder.

      • start

        public static RecipeMapBuilder start(java.lang.String name,
                                     CustomRecipeProperty... recipeProperties)
        Start construction, with the given name. This will be used for localisation and later referencing.

        Equivalent to start(name, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0).

        参数:
        name - The unlocalized name for the recipe map.
        返回:
        The initialized builder.

      • start

        public static RecipeMapBuilder start(java.lang.String name)
        Start construction, with the given name. This will be used for localisation and later referencing.

        Equivalent to start(name, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0).

        参数:
        name - The unlocalized name for the recipe map.
        返回:
        The initialized builder.

      • setSlotOverlay

        public RecipeMapBuilder setSlotOverlay(boolean isOutput,
                                       boolean isFluid,
                                       ITextureArea slotOverlay)
        Set a custom overlay for all slots of this kind.
        参数:
        isOutput - Whether this should apply to output slots, instead of input slots.
        isFluid - Whether this should apply to fluid slots, instead of item slots.
        slotOverlay - The overlay texture.
        返回:
        This builder, for convenience.

      • setSlotOverlay

        public RecipeMapBuilder setSlotOverlay(boolean isOutput,
                                       boolean isFluid,
                                       boolean isLast,
                                       ITextureArea slotOverlay)
        Set a custom overlay for all slots of this kind.
        参数:
        isOutput - Whether this should apply to output slots, instead of input slots.
        isFluid - Whether this should apply to fluid slots, instead of item slots.
        isLast - Whether this should apply only to the last slot of this kind.
        slotOverlay - The overlay texture.
        返回:
        This builder, for convenience.
